abstract: Judge John Jarvey dismisses charges against John Tate, Ron Paul's 2012 presidential campaign manager, alleging that he bribed former Iowa Sen Kent Sorenson for his endorsement; charges remain against aides Jesse Benton and Dimitri Kesari.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge dismissed charges Friday against Ron Paul’s 2012 presidential campaign manager.

headline.main: Iowa: Charges Dropped Against One Ron Paul Aide
headline.print_headline: Iowa: Charges Dropped Against One Ron Paul Aide

snippet: A federal judge dismissed charges Friday against Ron Paul’s 2012 presidential campaign manager.
